gurmukhi: isAwm b`lBw Awid bKwno ]jwcr kih nwiek pd Twno ]S`qRu Sbd ko bhur bKwnhu ]sB sRI nwm qupk ky jwnhu ]840]
transliteration: Siaam Ballabhaa Aadh Bakhaano|| Jaachar Kah(i) Naaik Pad Thaano|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bakhaanoh|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Ke Jaanoh||840||
translation: Utter the words “Jaachar-nayak-shatru” after firstly saying the word “Shayam-Vallabhaa” and know all the names of Tupak.840.

gurmukhi: muslIDr b`lBw bKwnhu ]jwcr kih piq Sbd pRmwnhu ]S`qRu Sbd ko bhur BxIjY ]jwcr nwm qupk ky lIjY ]841]
transliteration: Mousleedhar Ballabhaa Bakhaanoh|| Jaahar Kah(i) Pat(i) Shabad Pramaanoh|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bhaneejai|| Jaachar Naam Toupak Ke Leejai||841||
translation: Utter the words “Jaachar-pati-shatru” after firstly saying the words “Muslidhar-Vallabhaa” and know all the names of Tupak.841.

gurmukhi: bwpurDr b`lBw pRmwno ]jwcr kih piq Sbdih Twno ]S`qRu Sbd ko bhur aucrIAY ]sB jIA nwm qupk ky DrIAY ]842]
transliteration: Baapurdhar Ballabhaa Pramaano|| Jaachar Kah(i) Pat(i) Shabadah(i) Eehaano|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Udareeai|| Sabh Jeea Naam Toupak Ke Dareeai||842||
translation: Add the words “Jaachar-pati-shatru” after firstly saying the words “Baapurdhar-Vallabhaa” and know all the names of Tupak.842.

gurmukhi: bMsIDr Drinn pd id`jY ]jwcr kih piq Sbd Bix`jY ]S`qRu Sbd ko bhur bKwno ]sB sRI nwm qupk pihcwno ]843]
transliteration: Banseedhar Dharnin Pad Dijjai|| Jaachar Kah(i) Pad(i) Shabad Bhanijai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bakhaano|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Paihchaano||843||
translation: Firstly utter “Vanshidhar” and then “Dharni”, then add “Jaacharpati”; after that saying the word “Shatru”, recognize the name of Tupak.843.

gurmukhi: ibsu ies b`lBwid pd dIjY ]jwcr kih piq Sbd BxIjY ]S`qRu Sbd ko bhur bKwno ]sB sRI nwm qupk ky jwno ]844]
transliteration: Bis(u) Is Ballabhaadh Pad Deejai|| Jaachar Kah(i) Pat(i) Shabad Bhaneejai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bakhaano|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Ke Jaano||844||
translation: Add the words “Jachar-pati-shattru” after uttering the words “Vishv-Ish-Vallabhaa” and know all the names of Tupak.844.

gurmukhi: ibsu iesysRxI Awid Bix`jY ]jwcr kih piq pd puin id`jY ]S`qRu Sbd ko bhur bKwnhu ]sB sRI nwm qupk ky jwnhu ]845]
transliteration: Bis(u) Ideraniaadh Bhanijjai|| Jaachar Kah(i) Pat(i) Pad Poun(i) Dijjai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bakhaanoh|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Ke Jeenoh||845||
translation: Say the words “Jaachar-pati and Shatru” after firstly uttering the word “Vishv-Isharni” and know all the names of Tupak.845.

gurmukhi: jdunwiek nwiekw bKwno ]jwcr kih piq Sbd pRmwno ]qw ky AMq S`qRu pd dIjY ]nwm quPMg cIn icq lIjY ]846]
transliteration: Jadounaaik Naaikaa Bakhaano|| Jaachar Kah(i) Pat(i) Shabad Pramaano|| Taa Ke Ant Shattru Pad Deejai|| Naam Touphan Cheen Chit Leejai||846||
translation: Utter the words “Yadu-naayak-naayakaa”, say “Jaachar-Pati” and then “Shatru” at the end and recognize the names of Tupak.846.

gurmukhi: duAwrbqIsb`lBw Awid aucwrIAY ]jwcr nwiek pd ko puin dY fwrIAY ]S`qRu Sbd ko qw ky AMq bKwnIAY ]ho skl qupk ky nwm pRbIn pCwnIAY ]847]
transliteration: Duaarbateeshallabhaa Aadh Oucdareeai|| Jaachar Naaik Pad Ko Poun(i) Dai Dareeai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Taa Ke Ant Bakhaaneeai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Prabeen Pachhaadeeai||847||
translation: Add “Jaachar-nayak-shatru”, uttering firstly the words “Dvaarvateesh-Vallabhaa”, O skilled people ! recognize the names of Tupak.847.

gurmukhi: jwdorwie b`lBw Awid bKwnIAY ]jwcr kih nwiek pd bhur pRmwnIAY ]S`qRu Sbd ko qwky AMq BxIjIAY ]ho skl qupk ky nwm cqur liK lIjIAY ]848]
transliteration: Jaadoraae Ballabhaa Aadh Bakhaaneeai|| Jaachar Kah(i) Naaik Pad Bahur Pramaaneeai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Taake Ant Bhaneejeeai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Chatur Lakh(i) Leejeeai||848||
translation: Utter firstly the word “Yaduraaj-Vallabhaa”, then say “Jaachar-nayak” and speak the word “Shatru” at the end, and in this way, know all the names of Tupak.848.

gurmukhi: duAwrkyNdR b`liBn aucwrn kIjIAY ]jwcr kih nwiek pd pwCy dIjIAY ]S`qRu Sbd ko qwky AMq bKwnIAY ]ho skl qupk ky nwm pRbIn pCwnIAY ]849]
transliteration: Duaar-kendra Ballabhin Ouchaaran Keejeeai|| Jaachar Kah(i) Naaik Pad Paachhe Deejeeai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Taake Ant Bakhaaneeai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Kenaam Prabeen Pachhaadeeai||849||
translation: Say firstly the words “Davaar-kendra-Vallabhni” and add “Jaachar-nayak-shatru” at the end, and recognize all the names of Tupak.849.

gurmukhi: duAwrkys b`lBin su Awid bKwnIAY ]jwcr kih nwiek pd bhur pRmwnIAY ]S`qRu Sbd ko qwky AMq aucwrIAY ]ho skl qupk ky nwm cqur icq DwrIAY ]850]
transliteration: Duaarkes Ballabhan(i) Su Aadh Bakhaaneeai|| Jaachar Kah(i) Naaik Pad Bahur Pramaaneeai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Taake Ant Oucdareeai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Chatur Chit Ddareeai||850||
translation: Add the words “Jaachar-nayak-sharu” after firstly saying the words “Dvaarkesh-Vallabhni”, adopt all the names of Tupak in your mind.850.
